definition: to curb/to put a stop to/to stop/to check/to limit
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: They don't know how to stop or prevent it.
sentences.chinese: 他們不知道如何制止或預防這種恐懼。

sentences.english: He did not stop her, because he understood her love towards him.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有制止她，因爲他知道她的一片苦心。

sentences.english: There was a laugh which he cut off brusquely with a gesture.
sentences.chinese: 人們發出一陣鬨笑，他做了個手勢，猛然制止了笑聲。

sentences.english: As the market slumps, homeowners are taking action to stop the build-up of boards.
sentences.chinese: 隨着市場的低迷，房主正在採取行動，制止集結板。
保險箱能有效制止盜賊。

sentences.english: Many European countries have yet to announce bans on Japanese food imports.
sentences.chinese: 很少歐洲國野還入有公佈制止入口夜原食品。

sentences.english: Vos voyaged to Coruscant to kill Senator Kaa, but Windu stopped Vos in time.
sentences.chinese: 昆蘭前往科洛桑暗殺卡議員，所幸被溫杜及時制止。

sentences.english: Nobody obeyed the teacher's commmand to stop chatting.
sentences.chinese: 老師制止學生聊天，卻無人聽從。

sentences.english: Prevention Countermeasures against Street Crime--With the Olympics as the background;
sentences.chinese: 我們要制止犯罪，制止街上粗魯的罪行。

sentences.english: Prevention Countermeasures against Street Crime--With the Olympics as the background;
sentences.chinese: 我們要制止犯罪，制止街上粗魯的罪行。

sentences.english: We will strongly advocate hard work and plain living and firmly oppose extravagance and waste.
sentences.chinese: 大力提倡艱苦奮鬥，堅決制止奢侈浪費。

sentences.english: The organization is also paying to train local guides on how to stop theft and illegal tree-cutting.
sentences.chinese: 該組織還支付培訓如何制止盜竊和非法伐木當地導遊。

sentences.english: Poyang Lake helps keep down floods on the Changjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 在汛期，都陽湖有助於制止長江氾濫成災。

sentences.english: Can mispricings or bubbles persist in the presence of rational arbitrageurs?
sentences.chinese: 理性套利者的存在能夠制止價格誤定或泡沫麼？

sentences.english: I and others on our team had urged Arafat to prevent violence.
sentences.chinese: 我和代表團的其他成員一直敦促阿拉法特制止暴力。

sentences.english: Bvoid roads, bridges, or ramps that might have been damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 制止門路，橋樑，或者有可能已經被地動損壞的斜道。

definition: to shout at sb to stop
to check/to contain/to hold back/to keep within limits/to constrain/to restrain
to hint/to indicate (an idea to sb)
